key.tab_tweaks.max-players.description: Change the maximum number of players that can appear in the tab list. By default, Minecraft has a maximum of 80.
key.tab_tweaks.remove-header-shadow.desc: Remove the shadow of the tab list header.
key.tab_tweaks.remove-body-shadow.descri: Remove the shadow of the player names in the body.
key.tab_tweaks.remove-footer-shadow.desc: Remove the shadow of the tab list footer.
key.tab_tweaks.remove-player-heads.descr: Remove player heads from the tab list.
key.tab_tweaks.improved-player-head-hats: Show the full hat layer when rendering the head.
key.tab_tweaks.remove-ping.description: Remove ping from the tab list.
key.tab_tweaks.show-numerical-ping.descr: Replace the ping icon with a numerical value.
key.tab_tweaks.remove-numerical-ping-sha: Removes the shadow on the numerical ping.
key.tab_tweaks.scale-numerical-ping.desc: Scales the ping display to make it smaller.
Some servers force a ping of 0 or 1 or very high numbers to hide players ping. This will hide the number from being displayed as it is useless.
key.tab_tweaks.move-tab-list-down.descri: Moves the tab list down by the specified number of units.
key.tab_tweaks.move-tab-list-below-bossb: Moves the tab list below all bossbars. This will take priority over the "Move Tab List Down" setting.
